headline: Frequently Asked Questions
subline: Everything you need to know — clearly and transparently.
q1: How long does it take to build a website?
a1: Depending on scope, a project typically takes 2–6 weeks. A starter package is often ready in 2 weeks, while enterprise projects with CMS and custom features take 6–8 weeks.
a2: Our Starter package starts from €299, Professional from €799 and Enterprise from €1,499. Additional modules like booking systems, shops or newsletters can be added. All prices on request.
q3: Can I edit the content myself?
a3: Yes! With our Enterprise package you get an easy-to-use CMS where you can update text, images and content yourself — without coding skills. For Starter and Professional packages we handle updates on request.
a4: Yes, we recommend reliable hosting partners and can handle the setup. Our maintenance package (from €39/month) includes hosting, updates, backups and security monitoring.
a5: After launch we continue to support you. We offer various maintenance and support packages that ensure your website stays up-to-date, secure and performant.
a6: We use modern, proven technologies: React, TypeScript, Vite for the frontend and Go or Node.js for the backend when needed. For CMS we use headless solutions like Sanity or Contentful. All websites are therefore fast, secure and low-maintenance.
